triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The paper addresses hallucination issues in LLMs and uses them as the foundation for dialogue generation.

triples.name: Search engine
triples.relevance: The paper proposes learning to generate internet search queries and condition responses on search results.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the known problem of LLMs hallucinating facts when generating dialogue.

triples.name: FAISS
triples.relevance: The paper compares their search-query approach against existing FAISS-based retrieval methods.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the task of generating dialogue in conversational agents with knowledge grounding.

triples.name: Information retrieval
triples.relevance: The paper employs information retrieval techniques to find relevant search results for grounding dialogue responses.

triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes augmenting dialogue generation with internet search results, similar to RAG approaches.

triples.name: Grounding in communication
triples.relevance: The paper grounds dialogue responses in internet search results to provide factually accurate, up-to-date information.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The paper develops conversational agents (chatbots) with internet search augmentation for knowledge-driven dialogue.
